response: My wife Margaret Joan Howe was a wonderful person who contributed greatly to my life and work. We married in 1940 and had three beautiful children together, Robin, Peter, and Sally Joan. She was the one who provided a peaceful and happy home for me, which allowed me to focus on my research and pursue my passions. I often credited her with contributing more to my work than anyone else, as she created an environment that was conducive to my productivity and happiness. She was an incredible partner and supporter, and I feel fortunate to have had her by my side for so many years.
